azurerm_private_dns_txt_record.description: Manages a Private DNS TXT Record.

name.description: The name of the DNS TXT Record. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the resource group where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

zone_name.description: Specifies the Private DNS Zone where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

record.description: One or more `record` blocks as defined below.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

value.description: The value of the TXT record. Max length: 1024 characters

id.description: The Private DNS TXT Record ID.

fqdn.description: The FQDN of the DNS TXT Record.

create.description: Used when creating the Private DNS TXT Record.

update.description: Used when updating the Private DNS TXT Record.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Private DNS TXT Record.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Private DNS TXT Record.
